page.title: 04PENTRE
page.content: PENTRE IS THE SECOND BIGGEST VILLAGE IN THE AREA,BUT IT IS WHERE OUR SCHOOL IS.THE OLDEST HOUSE IS 300 YEARS OLD.THE NEWEST HOUSES ARE ABOUT 10 YEARS OLD.OUR SCHOOL IS ABOUT 150 YEARS OLD AND WAS ORIGINALLY A CHURCH.4 YEARS AGO THE EDUCATION AUTHORITY WANTED TO CLOSE IT BECAUSE IT ONLY HAS 31 PUPILS,BUT THE PARENTS PROTESTED AND IT WAS KEPT OPEN.PEOPLE LIKE LIVING IN PENTRE,BUT THE TROUBLE IS EVERYONE IS GETTING OLD.THERE ARE ONLY 7 CHILDREN,AND ONLY 2 COME TO PENTRE SCHOOL.BECAUSE THERE ARE SO MANY RETIRED PEOPLE ALL THE GARDENS ARE WELL LOOKED AFTER,BUT AFTER THE SCHOOL SHUTS EACH DAY,EVERYTHING IS DEAD QUIET.EVEN THE 2 CHILDREN WHO COME TO PENTRE SCHOOL OFTEN GO TO STAY WITH THEIR NAN BECAUSE THEIR MUM WORKS NIGHTS AT CHIRK HOSPITAL.
